input_args.passage: "The Lord of the Rings/Author | John Ronald Reuel Tolkien, J.R.R. Tolkien, in full John Ronald Reuel Tolkien, (born January 3, 1892, Bloemfontein, South Africa—died September 2, 1973, Bournemouth, Hampshire, England), English writer and scholar who achieved fame with his children's book The Hobbit (1937) and his richly inventive epic fantasy The Lord of the Rings (1954–55)., J.R.R. Tolkien\nThe Lord of the Rings | The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel by the English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien. Set in Middle-earth, the story began as a sequel to ..."
input_args.claim: "Source provides full details of the author's name and birth information, while source confirms Tolkien as the author of the epic high-fantasy novel."
